identity.name: TradeAI Pro
identity.description: A professional trading command center that blends Bloomberg terminal density with Cyberpunk aesthetics. Every pixel serves data. Dark by default.

heading.usage: Page titles, major section headers, metric values (big numbers). Tight tracking.

body.usage: General UI text, labels, descriptions. Excellent readability at small sizes.

mono.usage: Price tickers, code snippets, order book data, timestamps, financial tables.

effects.scanline: background: repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, transparent, transparent 2px, #000 3px); opacity: 0.1; pointer-events: none;

layout.marketing_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 md:gap-12 px-6 py-12 max-w-7xl mx-auto

buttons.primary: bg-[#00F5A0] text-black hover:bg-[#00D9F5] font-bold transition-all duration-200 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,245,160,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/20 transition-all

inputs.default: bg-[#0B0E11] border border-[#2A2F3A] text-white focus:border-[#00F5A0] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00F5A0] placeholder-slate-600

hero_backgrounds.description: Abstract candlestick chart fading into darkness
hero_backgrounds.usage: Login page background, Hero section overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Override the css variables in index.css with the hex codes provided in 'palette' section. Do not rely on default shadcn slate colors. The app must look pitch black/obsidian, not grey.
Use 'recharts' for all charts. Style them with: <CartesianGrid stroke='#2A2F3A' strokeDasharray='3 3' /> and <Tooltip contentStyle={{ backgroundColor: '#15191E', borderColor: '#2A2F3A' }} />.
For the 'Trading Journey' journal, use a dense table layout with status badges (Win/Loss) using the 'status' colors.
Gamification elements (XP, badges) should use the 'neon' glow effects.
Ensure 'Sign Up' and 'Login' pages use the 'hero_backgrounds' images with a heavy black overlay (bg-black/80) so text pop.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
All interactive elements MUST include 'data-testid' attribute.
